content: crochet flowers by designer charissa clark howe crochet this garden of flowers for decorating clothes and accessories or make a bunch of flowers as a gift to brighten someone s day they also make great package trim skill level advanced beginner supplies cotton yarn in weight and colors of choice each flower only takes a few yds of yarn appropriately sized hook for weight of yarn please see end of pattern for list of abbreviations daisy round 1 in mc chain 2 12sc in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch in first single_crochet 12 st round 2 chain 3 double_crochet in same st as chain
